sentences.en: Top supermarkets are to ban many genetically modified foods.
sentences.cn: 顶级的超市将禁止销售许多转基因的食品。

sentences.en: Genetically speaking, there are advantages to avoiding substantial height.
sentences.cn: 从遗传学上讲，避免身高过高有很多好处。

sentences.en: The author believes emotional energy is inherited and genetically determined.
sentences.cn: 作者认为情感能量是遗传和基因决定的。
